mapper.sql: id, shop_name, title, dispatch_pay, dispatch_time, assess_rate, address, dispatch_price, salesroom_price, phone, business_time, main_picture, average, month_pay, shop_type

select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from t_shop
order by ${orderByClause}
